 2022-04562022-04-29,  HDI,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Mortgage and Housing Corporation Act
Financial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Appointing Ernst & Young as Auditor and the Auditor General of Canada as Joint Auditor of the Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation
PrecisOrder appointing (1) ERNST & YOUNG LLP of Ottawa, Ontario, as AUDITOR; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation for the 2022 calendar year.
